puzzle
Class WordSearch

java.lang.Object
  puzzle.WordSearch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Puzzle
public class WordSearch
extends java.lang.Object
implements Puzzle

A WordSearch puzzle is a specialized Puzzle. It is a square that consists of randomly placed words that can intersect.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Sad Panda Software

Parameters:

colSize - number of columns.
